objects.name: Scrolling_Information
objects.string: When Creating a scrolling background make sure to have an image that fits the Game canvas fully if not then go to Example: http://www.simpleimageresizer.com/ to resize your image so it fits the games canvas. Make sure background is at postion x:0 and Y:0 in the Properties tab.

objects.name: Tween_Behavior
objects.string: Make sure to add the Tween Behavior to all objects in-game

objects.name: Titled_Sprite
objects.string: Make sure Background is a Titled Sprite

objects.name: Slide_Animations
objects.string: Create a scene variable called "Slide_Animation" and set it to 1 when scene starts. Create a "Scene" variable to indicate when scene will be switched and what scene to switch to when "Switch animation" is done.

objects.name: Subscribe
objects.string: Subscribe to Dreamkingmovies on Youtube as it will help us a lot!

objects.name: License
objects.string: Everything in this project can be used commercially! So feel free to use as a templete for your game!!!

objects.name: Dont_Work
objects.string: The shop and Settings button do not work!

events.comment: Make sure to add tween behavior on all sprites displayed on screen or animations won't work
If you played Minecraft you will be familer with this animation!

Make sure Tween Animation behavoir is on the objects. Make sure every object visible in the scene has an animation so it will look good! This project we only want to tween the y-axis so bring your object off the screen at the same time not changing the x-postion of the object so it can swing From its postion. For the Switch animation it is best to use "swingFrom" since it will make your project look very smooth. The duration should be at a resonable amount of 2000ms or less as higher values will not look appealing based on the project type you are going for. It is inportant that you call all animation "Switch" so you can recongize it. Delays help everything move at different times so it looks smoother!

Make sure every object visible in the scene has an animation so it will look good! Make sure Tween Behavior is on the objects. This project we only want to tween the y-axis so bring your object off the screen at the same time not changing the x-postion of the object so it can swing to its postion. For the Startup animation it is best to use "swingTo" since it will make your project look very smooth. The duration should be at a reasonable amount of 2000ms or less as higher values will not look appealing based on the project type you are going for. It is inportant that you call all animation "Startup"  so you can recongize it. Delays help everything move at different times so it looks smoother!
Once "Slide_Animation" = 0 then buttons will be interactible but make sure to turn it on once all the animations are done or the Startup Animation will not work

When Slide Animation = 0 then thats when the buttons can be interacted or the scene startup animation will not work. The switch animation occurs when slide animation = 2. Switch animation is the animation to a new level. All animations have to  be done before you can interact with the buttons.
Also thank you WishForgeGaming for make the tutorial about button animation

Make Sure that your Background is a "Titled Sprite", Is the same size as the Game Canvas Use (http://www.simpleimageresizer.com/) to change size, Is a loopable image (Meaning an image that is ment to be looped So project looks good. (https://opengameart.org/) To get a loopable image) and is at postion X:0 Y:0 Z-Order -5. Use this to create scorlling effect and if you want scrolling direction to face other way make sure to use negative values. Change the value for a faster or slower scrolling effect!
A Little Music to hype to mood!

objects.name: License
objects.string: Everything in this project can be used commercially! So feel free to use as a templete for your game!!!
